Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Social media is abuzz with posts about the Australian budget and its impact on small businesses. The Small Business Energy Incentive is the highlight offering support in the form of system upgrades and energy-efficient appliances. However delays in payment times to suppliers are causing financial hurdles since they are blown out to 120 days. Meanwhile posts addressing the budget reveal covert budgeting tactics leaving several programs to lose funding overnight. Despite the mess efforts will be made to clean up the fiscal mess in a responsible and methodical manner.
